name: tdd-spec-workflow
description: Test-Driven Development with spec-workflow-mcp and Ralph Wiggum loops. Multi-language support (Python, JS/TS, Go, Rust, Java, Swift, C#, Xojo, and custom). Autonomous task execution with real-time dashboard.
author: Your Team

optional.note: Ralph Wiggum needed for autonomous mode (/tdd:execute-task). Not needed for manual mode (/tdd:execute-task-manual).

postInstall.message:
TDD Spec Workflow v2 installed!

Task Execution Modes:
  /tdd:execute-task <id>        - Autonomous (requires Ralph)
  /tdd:execute-task-manual <id> - Interactive (no Ralph needed)

For autonomous mode, install Ralph:
  /plugin install ralph-wiggum@claude-plugins-official

Initialize your project:
  /tdd:init              (auto-detect)
  /tdd:init --mode full  (new repo)
  /tdd:init --mode steering (add steering docs)
  /tdd:init --mode entries  (add TDD entries only)
